name: Designated Contact
description: This EM manages the setting of a Designated Contact for each Redcap project.

crons.cron_description: This cron will run once a week on Saturday to check for projects with no DC selected, no non-suspended users and no log activity in the last 12 months.
This cron will set the creator of the project
This cron will reassign a new DC to projects whose DC is suspended
This cron will set a DC when one has not been selected

system-settings.name:
Designated Contact project id
REDCap project which stores designated contact data

Designated Contact event id
REDCap event which stores designated contact data

Number of days between required verification
Projects will be required to re-verify their designated contact selection on this schedule

From email address
Enter the email address that will be used for the From address.

New Designated Contact Email Subject Line
Enter the subject line for the email which will be sent to new designated contacts. This email will be used to inform people that they were selected as the designated contacts for a Redcap project.

New Designated Contact Email Body
Enter text to appear in the email which will be sent to people when they are selected to be designated contact. The project ID and person making the change are automatically added to the end of the email.

Old Designated Contact Email Subject Line
Enter the subject line which will be used in the email sent to people who are no longer designated contacts for a project.

Old Designated Contact Email Body
Enter text to appear in the email which will be sent to people when they are no longer a designated contact for the project. The project ID and person making the change are automatically added to the end of the email.

Designated Contact Description
Enter text to appear in the designation contact information modal

Subject Link for Auto-Assigned Emails
Enter text to appear in the Subject link of emails sent to projects that have DC auto-assigned

Body text for Auto-Assigned Emails
Enter text to appear in the body of emails sent to projects that have DC auto-assigned

Subject Link git for Re-Assigned Emails
Enter text to appear in the Subject link of emails sent to projects that have DC re-assigned. Current DC is suspended

Body text for Re-Assigned Emails
Enter text to appear in the body of emails sent to projects that have DC re-assigned
